page.title: 17LEEK GROWING
page.content: Leek growing is very popular in this part of the country.Not only do people like cooking and eating leeks but they also grow them for competitions.These competitions are run by the local Workingmen's Clubs, and many pubs Leek Shows too.There are cash prizes of anything up to Â£200 for having the prize leek.This means that the men take their leek growing very seriously and there is a lot of rivalry between leek growers. To grow leeks first you build a trench.You have to make sure that the soil is very rich before you plant your 'sets'.Most people use manure & you have to weed your leeks & water them daily.Rotting leaves have to be pul;led off straight away.Lots of leek growers have secret ingredients to make their leeks grow to champion size.
